attributes.action: Bring Back Capital punishment For Child Murderers and Child rapists
attributes.additional_details:
Bring Back humane Capital punishment for Child Murderers and Pedophiles.

Action I want the government to take

- Child Murderers must be punished, 7 year sentences are nothing its either LIFE (intill death in prison) or Death by injection.

This will send a STRONG message to the rest of the country that we will NO LONGER tolerate crimes against innocent children .
